short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the harmonious interplay of light and darkness.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This visually stunning theme features a vibrant yin-yang composition where nature's elements are brought to life through cherry blossom trees, mountain peaks, and a glowing moon. On one side, experience the warmth of a radiant sun illuminating blooming pink and white trees, symbolizing life and serenity. On the other, dive into the tranquility of the night with a neon-red moon casting a mystical glow over a dark, mountainous landscape. Please note that this extension may include affiliate links.
